Text.Page:
Commander Dougal. As you know, I've been researching strange locations and phenomena ever since the Argon War.

When I heard rumours of argon sightings here in the Exodor Archipelago, I had to come and see for myself.

But I was in no way prepared for what they're doing.Read next pageClose letter

I've never had opportunity to study the divine beast Kelsaik directly, but I've heard stories from people like and was shocked to recognize its corpse being carried through the sky by a phalanx of argons!

They were flying towards Verrak Fortress, and I fear they may use the bioenergy transfer stations in that area on Kelsaik's remains!

Somebody must investigate as soon as possible and report back on any argon activity.

- VirienneGo to previous pageClose letter
